backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining clients, tasks, assignees, user profiles, and authorization‑protected CRUD operations using per‑caller Map storage.
feature_evidence.json: Report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs with high‑confidence evidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files and their functionality across pages, components, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme variables defining OKLCH‑based color tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App router setup with authentication gating, profile‑setup flow, and route definitions for all main pages.
frontend/src/components/assignees/Assign: CSV‑based bulk assignee upload dialog handling parsing, validation, and submission via bulkCreateAssignees.
Dialog form for creating, editing, and deleting assignees with validation and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter their name and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignedOutSc: Landing screen for signed‑out users with branding, feature highlights, and Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientBu: Dialog for uploading a CSV of clients, validating rows, previewing data, and bulk‑creating clients.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientFo: Dialog form for creating, editing, and deleting individual clients with validation and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppStartu: Error boundary that catches startup errors and displays a fallback error screen.
frontend/src/components/errors/StartupEr: Fallback UI shown on startup errors with a prompt to reload the page.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with navigation, mobile menu, user profile menu, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskBulkEd: Bulk edit dialog allowing updates to multiple tasks with optional fields and submission via bulkUpdateTasks.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskBulkUp: CSV-based bulk task upload dialog handling template download, file parsing, validation, and batch creation.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskDetail: Read‑only panel displaying all task fields with formatted dates, currency, and status labels.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskFormDi: Create/edit task form dialog managing full task input state and submitting via create or update mutations.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskQuickS: Inline status selector enabling quick task status updates through useUpdateTask.
frontend/src/constants/taskStatus.ts: Defines allowed task statuses and utilities for normalizing, validating, and displaying status values.
frontend/src/hooks/assignees.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD and bulk operations on assignees via the backend actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/clients.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD and bulk operations on clients using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/tasks.ts: React Query hooks for fetching, creating, updating, deleting, and bulk operations on tasks via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hooks for fetching and saving the current user's profile through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and related status.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/dataParser.ts: Deprecated client parsing utilities kept for backward compatibility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AssigneesPage.tsx: UI page for listing, filtering, editing, and bulk-deleting assignees using related hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a single client, including their tasks, statistics, and edit/create dialogs, with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsPage.tsx: Lists all clients with search, selection, bulk delete, and bulk upload features, plus dialogs for adding clients.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows task-based business metrics including counts, revenue stats, upcoming and overdue tasks, with navigation filters.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Provides full task management with filtering, sorting, bulk actions, creation/editing, CSV upload, and export capabilities.
frontend/src/utils/assigneeCsv.ts: Generates and parses CSV files for assignee bulk upload, including validation and backend format conversion.
frontend/src/utils/clientCsv.ts: Handles CSV template generation, parsing, validation, and backend conversion for client bulk uploads.
frontend/src/utils/taskAggregations.ts: Computes task statistics including totals, revenue by category, and status breakdowns for dashboard use.
frontend/src/utils/taskCsv.ts: Handles CSV template generation, parsing, and validation for bulk task upload, including date/number parsing and error collection.
frontend/src/utils/taskDisplay.ts: Provides formatting helpers for task dates, currency, and optional text with a consistent placeholder.
frontend/src/utils/taskExcel.ts: Converts tasks into Excel-friendly data and exports them using SheetJS, including date and currency formatting.
frontend/src/utils/taskSort.ts: Implements sorting logic for tasks across multiple fields using safe comparison helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Manages URL and sessionStorage parameters for routing and persistence, including retrieval and cleanup utilities.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, known issues, and architectural notes for the build.
